Deputy Manager-ETP Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 32 to 45 years Location: Gazipur (Kaliakair) Salary: Negotiable Published: 09 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 32 to 45 years Responsibilities & Context Operational Management: Manage and monitor daily ETP operations, including inlet effluent quality , treatment processes (biological, chemical), and final discharge to ensure compliance with environmental standards. Team Leadership: Supervise, train, and guide shift operators and technicians to ensure safety and operational efficiency. Maintenance & Troubleshooting: Oversee preventive and breakdown maintenance of machinery (pumps, aerators, filters) to minimize downtime. Compliance & Reporting: Ensure all discharge meets legal standards, manage documentation for audits (e.g., ISO, Pollution Control Board), and prepare daily shift reports. Process Optimization & Safety: Identify opportunities to reduce chemical and energy consumption (cost saving) and strictly implement safety protocols. Resource Management: Manage chemical inventory, handle reject water/sludge, and collaborate with maintenance teams for repairs. Skills & Expertise EMS ETP and WTP Health Safety and Environment Leadership and teamwork Microsoft Office Suggested by EMS ETP and WTP Health Safety and Environment Compensation & Other Benefits Mobile bill Salary Review: Yearly Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize Festival Bonus: 2 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Manager / Manager - Marketing & Sales Application Deadline : 16 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: At least 32 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Experience: At least 5 years Published: 15 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Electrical & Electronic Engineering Master of Science (MSc) in Electrical & Electronic Engineering Master of Business Administration (MBA) in Marketing American International University Bangladesh,North South University,BRAC University,Independent University, Bangladesh,Military Institute of Science and Technology (MIST) students will get preference Experience At least 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Manufacturing (Light Engineering and Heavy Industry), Power Additional Requirements Age At least 32 years Age 32 to 45 years Responsibilities & Context BETELCO (Manufacturing Electric machineries in the power sector) require experienced personnel in the following fields for its expansion program. Applications are hereby invited Marketing & Sales Division for this position. Title : Marketing & Sales of 33/11/.415kV Electrical Transformer, Switchgear & other Substation equipment, Generator, BBT, Solar energy System, LPS, Automation etc. We are currently looking for a dynamic and results-oriented Asst. Manager / Manager - Marketing & Sales engineer to join our team at BETELCO. The Asst. Manager/Manager - Marketing & Sales Engineer`s responsibilities include maintaining extensive knowledge of the products` parts, functions, and processes and assisting with closing sales where technical expertise may be required to fit clients` needs. To be successful as an Asst. Manager / Manager - Marketing & Sales engineer, you should possess an in-depth knowledge of our company`s technical products and services and you should be able to relate this knowledge in a way that is understandable to nontechnical customers. You should be driven to achieve your sales goals and should have excellent sales and customer service skills. As an Asst. Manager / Manager - Marketing & Sales engineer, you will drive business growth by understanding customer needs, providing technical solutions and effectively articulating the value of our products or services. Your role will be pivotal in effectively communicating technical information to customers and helping to develop and maintain relationships to build trust. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to our company’s success and be part of a high-performing sales team in a competitive market.
